Package com.vgrs.xcode.idna

Classes implementing the solutions proposed in the IDNA rfc.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Ace An abstract class implementing logic common to all ASCII Compatible Encodings.
Bidi Prevents certain groupings of unicode characters from IDN registration.
Charmap Implements the character mapping rules defined in the Stringprep and Nameprep rfc documents.
Idna Implementation of RFC 3490.
Nameprep The Nameprep implementation runs four constituent components (charmap, normalize, prohibit, bidi) in order as prescribed by the rfc.
Normalize Provides algorithm to normalize a domain
Prohibit Prevents certain unicode characters from IDN registration.
Punycode This class implements the ASCII-Compatible Encoding (ACE) algorithm Punycode: A Bootstring encoding of Unicode for Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA).
Race This class implements the ASCII-Compatible Encoding (ACE) algorithm Race.
 

Package com.vgrs.xcode.idna Description

Classes implementing the solutions proposed in the IDNA rfc. These include the elements of Nameprep as well as ACE encodings.
